structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Designation of qualified department employee to fill vacancy.
law.text: Whenever a vacancy occurs in the property valuation administrator's office, the commissioner of revenue shall designate a qualified department employee to carry on the duties of the office until the vacancy is filled by appointment or by election. The department employee so designated shall be compensated from Department of Revenue funds in the same manner and at the same rate as compensated prior to his receiving the designation, plus necessary expenses, including travel. The individual shall have all the powers and be subject to all the administrative regulations applying to property valuation administrators.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 194, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 338, sec. 23, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990, ch. 411. sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 10, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 3.
